short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Simulates how people with disabilities experience the web

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Web Disability Simulator lets you experience how people with different disabilities or inadequate abilities perceive a web site. Simulate color blindness, low vision, dyslexia and more. An easy-to-use tool both to increase understanding and lower the threshold to test accessibility on a website.
